{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = 802.11abgn Wireless Module |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Roku |model = . |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = HD/XR (N1101) |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = June 4, 2010 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Roku_HD_XR_Wireless_Module |sernum = |wlclass = AN600 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = (non-standard connector) |formfactor = |vendor_id = |device_id = |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = TC2N1101 |icid = |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4323; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Foxconn |manuf_model = 95.0209T02 |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 11/19/2009 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :[[wikipedia:Roku|'''Roku''' on Wikipedia]] :[http://support.roku.com/entries/20345913-Product-Comparison-All-Roku-Player-Models Product Comparison All Roku Player Models] *The Roku HD XR is a Netflix/Pandora/MLB TV streaming device with built-in 2x2 MIMO dual band WiFi. :It contains a daughterboard holding the WiFi components including two U.FL connectors in addition to two onboard antennas. *"95.0209T02", "REV:0 GP", and "800580" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :Chip is BCM4323KFBGH. This device does not use a standard USB connector. :This device is shown as using two [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=946 '''Skyworks''' / ('''SiGe''')
SE2548A / 2548A Dual Band abgn Front End Modules]. [[Category:English Documentation]]
